title: DiRT 3 Mud and Guts & Power and Glory Car Pack
description:

Things you need:

2) IF U GOT THE COMPLETE EDITION "REPACK" THEN SKIP THIS STEP
If you got the "FiGHTCLUB" iso then also get this torrent http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/7113625/Dirt.3.Complete.Edition.CrackFix.READNFO-FiGHTCLUB

3) Unpack the .rar file (DiRT_3_DLC) provided in this torrent and install it in the folder where you have installed DiRT 3

4) Enjoy the "Complete Edition" with ALL cars!!!!
